sense.gloss: pursuit (of a goal, ideal, etc.), search, chase, seeking after
investigation (e.g. into someone's guilt), questioning, pressing, hounding, pinning down
to chase, to run after, to pursue, to follow after
to follow (a set order, a trend, etc.)
to drive out, to get rid of, to oust, to expel
exile, banishment, eviction, deportation, purge, expulsion, ousting

sdata.j: もしスペンサーが↑文↑↓ぶん↓を↑足↑↓た↓して↑訳↑↓やく↓し↑続↑↓つづ↓けなければ、↑他↑↓た↓の↑貢献↑↓こうけん↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓がきっと↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑追↑↓お↓い↑抜↑↓ぬ↓くだろう。
sdata.e: If Spenser doesn't keep adding and translating sentences, the other contributors will surely surpass him.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はクラスのみんなに↑追↑↓お↓いつくために、↑一生懸命↑↓いっしょうけんめい↓↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓しなくてはならない。
sdata.e: You have to study hard to catch up with your class.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓がどんなに↑速↑↓はや↓く↑歩↑↓ある↓いても、↑彼↑↓かれ↓には↑追↑↓お↓いつけません。
sdata.e: However fast you may walk, you can't catch up with him.

sdata.j: ↑金曜日↑↓きんようび↓↑締↑↓し↓め↑切↑↓き↓りのプロジェクトに↑追↑↓お↓われています。
sdata.e: I'm tied up with a project that is due Friday.

sdata.j: ↑供給↑↓きょうきゅう↓がまもなく↑需要↑↓じゅよう↓に↑追↑↓お↓いつくでしょう。
そして↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑牛↑↓うし↓や↑羊↑↓ひつじ↓も↑皆↑↓みな↓、↑宮↑↓みや↓から↑追↑↓お↓いだした。
sdata.e: And he chased the cattle, the sheep, and the people out of the temple.

sdata.j: ↑急↑↓いそ↓げば↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑追↑↓お↓いつくでしょう。
sdata.e: If you hurry, you'll catch up with him.

sdata.j: ↑急↑↓いそ↓ぎなさい。さもないと↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑追↑↓お↓いつけないでしょう。
sdata.e: Hurry up, or you won't catch up with him.

sdata.j: ↑会議↑↓かいぎ↓で↑川添↑↓かわぞえ↓さんの↑追及↑↓ついきゅう↓を↑受↑↓う↓けて↑冷↑↓ひ↓や↑汗↑↓あせ↓ものだったよ。
sdata.e: When Kawazoe pinned me down at the meeting, I broke out in a cold sweat.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑国外↑↓こくがい↓に↑追放↑↓ついほう↓した。
sdata.e: We banished him from the country.

words.gloss: pursuit (of a goal, ideal, etc.), search, chase, seeking after
investigation (e.g. into someone's guilt), questioning, pressing, hounding, pinning down
